description.value: Asteadyfusion often appears heavily reinforcedor bears rocky motifs. It allows you to use your physical power to steady your weapon and make your attacks more dangerous. As a full action, you can make a single ranged attack that deals additional damage equal to your Strength bonus to all targets. This fusion can be applied only to a ranged weapon without the thrown property.

modifiers.name: Steady Fusion
modifiers.notes: Apply when using the Steady Fusion's action with the attached weapon.
